Combat
Hit Points: 68 Armor Class: 23 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 20 (strength; trained)
Armor: Splint Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Composite Longbow (+10 1d8+1 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Crossbow (+10 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Daikyu (+10 1d8+1 P R80'; dexterity; expert); Shield Boss (+12 1d6+3 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Archer Dedication: Weapon Familiarity (Bows; Crossbows)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Swords): Attack Master (Simple Swords; Martial Swords)/Attack Expert (Advanced Swords)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Pick): Weapon Familiarity (Pick)
Archer Dedication: Critical hits with an expert proficiency bow or crossbow inflict its critical specialization effect
Archer's Aim: (2) Ranged Strike with a bow or crossbow gains +2 attack, ignores concealment, and can attack a hidden target with a DC 5 flat check
Assisting Shot: (1) Successful ranged Strike gives the next ally attack on the target +1 attack, or +2 with a critical success, until the start of the next turn
Crossbow Ace: (1) Uses Create A Diversion or Take Cover, then Interact to reload a crossbow
Crossbow Terror: (1) Makes an Intimidation check after loading a crossbow; gains +2 on the check from a prior successful crossbow Strike in the same turn
Double Shot: (2) Makes 2 ranged Strikes against different foes at the current multiple attack penalty -2
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Impossible Volley: (3) Ranged Strike with a -2 penalty attacks all foes in a 10' radius
Mobile Shot Stance: (1) Stance allows making ranged Strikes without triggering reactions and using Reactive Strike with a loaded ranged weapon to attack an adjacent creature
Multishot Stance: (1) Stance reduces Double Shot and Triple Shot penalties to -1 and -2
Parting Shot: (2) Steps away from a foe and makes a ranged Strike with the target off-guard
Point Blank Stance: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 HP damage within the first range increment of a ranged non-volley weapon
Quick Shot: (1) Draws and Strikes with a loaded or reload 0 bow or crossbow
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Running Reload: (1) Reloads during a Stride, Step, or Sneak
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Triple Shot: Can use Double Shot against 1 target or use 3 actions to make 3 ranged Strikes at the current multiple attack penalty -4
Unobstructed Shot: (2) Uses a single attack to Shove or Trip an adjacent creature, then make a ranged Strike
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Notes
Validation Errors:
Archer's Aim Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and archer dedication feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 3 available vs. 15 allocated
Crossbow Terror Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and archer dedication feature (currently 1)
Impossible Volley Feat: Requires fighter level (currently 5) >= 18, ranger level >= 18, archer dedication level (currently 5) >= 20 or eldritch archer dedication level >= 20
Mobile Shot Stance Feat: Requires fighter level (currently 5) >= 8, fighter dedication level >= 16 or archer dedication level (currently 5) >= 10
Multishot Stance Feat: Requires double shot feature (currently 1) and fighter level (currently 5) >= 16 or archer dedication level (currently 5) >= 18
Running Reload Feat: Requires ranger level >= 4, ranger dedication level >= 8, archer dedication level (currently 5) >= 6 or eldritch archer dedication level >= 8
Triple Shot Feat: Requires double shot feature (currently 1) and fighter level (currently 5) >= 6, fighter dedication level >= 12 or archer dedication level (currently 5) >= 8
Unobstructed Shot Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 10, archer dedication feature (currently 1) and athletics rank (currently 2) >= 2
